refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the read preference for this collection

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
read_preference
The read preference mode: Mongo::RP_PRIMARY, Mongo::RP_PRIMARY_PREFERRED, Mongo::RP_SECONDARY, Mongo::RP_SECONDARY_PREFERRED, or Mongo::RP_NEAREST.
tags
An array of zero or more tag sets, where each tag set is itself an array of criteria used to match tags on replica set members.
